member.summary: Indicates whether the grid painter will use new algorithm to render a region (lighter).

summary.para: Indicates whether the sashimi fishes are displayed with the modifier "finned", i.e. Finned Sashimi Fish.
The default value is .
Indicates whether the fish name is used the sized one, i.e. 3-Fish, 4-Fish, etc..
The default value is .
Indicates the scale of values.
The default value is 0.(6), i.e. 2.0 / 3.0.
Indicates the scale of candidates.
The default value is 0.8, i.e. 4.0 / 5.0.
Indicates the grid line width of the sudoku grid to render.
The default value is 1.
Indicates the block line width of the sudoku grid to render.
The default value is 3.

member.summary: Indicates the size of the cross-hatching outline width.

member.name: P:Sudoku.UI.Data.Preference.CrossSignWidth
member.summary: Indicates the stroke thickness of the cross-hatching inner cross sign.

summary.para: Indicates the width of the highlight cell borders.
The default value is 1.5.
Indicates the width of the highlight candidate borders.
The default value is 1.5.
Indicates the width of the highlight region borders.
The default value is 1.5.
Indicates the font of given digits to render.
The default value is Fira Code.
Indicates the font of modifiable digits to render.
The default value is Fira Code.
Indicates the font of candidate digits to render.
The default value is Times New Roman.
Indicates the font style of the givens.
The default value is .
Indicates the font style of the modifiables.
The default value is .
Indicates the font style of the candidates.
The default value is .
Indicates the font style of an unknown identifier.
The default value is .

Indicates the candidate digits to render which is used in dark mode.

The default value is with the alpha 64.
Indicates the background color of the highlight cell borders which is used in dark mode.
The default value is (A: 64, R: 86, G: 156, B: 214).

Type Example

RGB #CCDDEE (i.e. #CCDDEE)

ARGB (255, 255, 255, 255) (i.e. #FFFFFFFF)

member.name: T:Sudoku.UI.Resources.UiResources
member.summary: Provides the methods that handles with resource dictionary.

member.name: F:Sudoku.UI.Resources.UiResources.Current
member.summary: Gets the default handler that interacts with resource dictionary.

remarks.para:
This is a instance, which means you can get anything you want using the following code style to get the items in this class:
Current.PropertyName (Property invokes)
Current[PropertyIndex] (Indexer invokes)
For example, if you want to get the value from the key "Bug", now you may write Current.Bug or Current["Bug"] to get that value.
